name: Rocket Subs
description:
You are now the assigned captain of our new ship - the Rocket Submarine.

Go forth and destroy our enemies!

Up - Boost
Left/Right - Rotate
Z - Fire

Are you an unstopable destruction machine ?
Rank up that multiplier and compete for the best score!

Prefer a litle acrobatic trainning ?
See how long you can keep from diving, but careful your fuel supply is limited!

Made for #indiesvsgamers 2015 edition

(Rebuilt for itch.io. please report any crashes)
